adverbs.description: historically (comparative more historically, superlative most historically)

entries.meaning: In a historic manner; with reference to history or the historical record.
examples: Historically speaking, this company has always collected payment before starting work.

entries.meaning: According to history: formerly, in the past, traditionally.
examples: Historically, this company collected payment before starting work.

entries.meaning: To an unprecedented or extremely rare degree.
